WELCOME.TITLE: Pone tu gimnasio en la nube!
WELCOME.DESCRIPTION: Les damos toda las llaves para manejar tu gimnasio.

SLIDES.TEXT_1: Our interface is intuitive and easy to understand.
SLIDES.TEXT_2: We offer you a level of customization avanced to manage your clients.
SLIDES.TEXT_3: See easily the evolution of your gym in time and about everything.

BROWSER.TITLE: No software to download
BROWSER.DESCRIPTION:
Welcome in the 21th century! No need to download anything, Sheaker is available directly on browser.
All your datas are saved safely in the cloud. You will never have a loss of informations if your computer don't work anymore.

EVERYWHERE.TITLE: Available everywhere
EVERYWHERE.DESCRIPTION: You can administrate your gym even from your house! All you need is just an internet connection and a computer, tablet or smartphone.

FEATURES.TITLE: The funny thing, we can't put them all.

MANAGE.TITLE: Manage
MANAGE.DESCRIPTION: A more effective and easy way to manage your clients and theirs payments.

INFORM.TITLE: Inform
INFORM.DESCRIPTION: Advise your customers at any time by sending mail, messages...

SCHEDULE.TITLE: Schedule
SCHEDULE.DESCRIPTION: Handle the gym schedule easily. Add training sessions and different events in few clicks.

STATS.TITLE: Stats
STATS.DESCRIPTION: Get a lot of nice statistics and graphics about your gym. Peak of attendance, monthly gains...

CLOSE.TITLE: Don't loose contact
CLOSE.DESCRIPTION: Keep your customers close to the gym by making them downloading the app.

BUSINESS.TITLE: Business
BUSINESS.DESCRIPTION: Keep a record of all your customers payments. Who pay how much and when.

MUSIC.TITLE: Music
MUSIC.DESCRIPTION: Motive your clients when they here by letting them picking their favorite music!
